Desc.entry: Provides a bank of staff trained to provide high quality tailor-made homecare or personal care to all age groups and abilities. Can provide staff members who will engage with and support people in the community and their homes. Support can include befriending, attending meetings and appointments, shopping, cleaning, routines, prompting to take medication/medicating and personal care. This company is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC) to ensure a quality service is provided.
